76 template<typename item_type__, class allocator_type__ = NCPP_DEFAULT_ALLOCATOR_TEMPLATE<item_type__>>
77 class NCPP_DEFAULT_ALIGNAS fls_vector_t {
78
82
83#pragma region Nested Types
84 public:
91 struct NCPP_ALIGNAS(8) sample_item_type
92 {
93
94 u32 fl_next_index;
95 u32 is_free : 1;
96
97 };
98#pragma endregion
99
103
104#pragma region Typedefs
105 public:
106 using allocator_type = allocator_type__;
107 using item_type = item_type__;
108 using item_vector_type = std::vector<item_type, allocator_type__>;
109 using iterator = item_type*;
110 using const_iterator = const item_type*;
111#pragma endregion
112
116
117#pragma region Properties
118 private:
119 item_vector_type item_vector_;
120 u32 fl_head_;
121 u32 fl_tail_;
122 bool is_fragmented_;
123 u32 count_;
124#pragma endregion
125
129
130#pragma region Getters and Setters
131 public:
132 inline u32 count() const { return count_; }
133 inline u32 size() const { return item_vector_.size(); }
134 inline u32 capacity() const { return item_vector_.capacity(); }
135 inline item_vector_type& item_vector() { return item_vector_; }
136 inline const item_vector_type& item_vector() const { return item_vector_; }
137 inline u32 fl_head() const { return fl_head_; }
138 inline u32 fl_tail() const { return fl_tail_; }
139 inline bool is_fl_empty() const { return fl_tail_ == NCPP_U32_MAX; }
140 inline bool is_fragmented() const { return is_fragmented_; }
141
142 inline iterator data() { return item_vector_.data(); }
143 inline const_iterator data() const { return item_vector_.data(); }
144 inline const_iterator cdata() const { return item_vector_.data(); }
145 inline iterator begin() { return item_vector_.data(); }
146 inline const_iterator begin() const { return item_vector_.data(); }
147 inline const_iterator cbegin() const { return item_vector_.data(); }
148 inline iterator end() { return item_vector_.data() + item_vector_.size(); }
149 inline const_iterator end() const { return item_vector_.data() + item_vector_.size(); }
150 inline const_iterator cend() const { return item_vector_.data() + item_vector_.size(); }
151#pragma endregion
152
156
157#pragma region Constructors, Destructor and Operators
158 public:
162 inline fls_vector_t(u32 capacity) :
163 count_(0),
164 fl_head_(NCPP_U32_MAX),
165 fl_tail_(NCPP_U32_MAX),
166 is_fragmented_(0)
167 {
168
169 item_vector_.reserve(capacity);
170
171 }
175 inline fls_vector_t(u32 capacity, const allocator_type& allocator) :
176 count_(0),
177 fl_head_(NCPP_U32_MAX),
178 fl_tail_(NCPP_U32_MAX),
179 is_fragmented_(0),
180 item_vector_(allocator)
181 {
182
183 item_vector_.reserve(capacity);
184
185 }
189 inline fls_vector_t() :
190 fls_vector_t(16)
191 {
192
193
194
195 }
196 ~fls_vector_t() {
197
198 clear();
199
200 }

205 inline fls_vector_t(const fls_vector_t& other) :
206 fls_vector_t(other.capacity())
207 {
208
209 fl_head_ = other.fl_head_;
210 fl_tail_ = other.fl_tail_;
211 is_fragmented_ = other.is_fragmented_;
212 item_vector_ = other.item_vector_;
213
214 }

219 {
220
221 fl_head_ = other.fl_head_;
222 fl_tail_ = other.fl_tail_;
223 is_fragmented_ = other.is_fragmented_;
224 item_vector_ = other.item_vector_;
225
226 return *this;
227 }
228

237 fl_tail_ = other.fl_tail_;

247 inline fls_vector_t& operator = (fls_vector_t&& other)
248 {
249
250 fl_head_ = other.fl_head_;
251 fl_tail_ = other.fl_tail_;

253 item_vector_ = other.item_vector_;

263 inline item_type& operator [] (u32 index) {
264
265 return at(index);
266 }
270 inline const item_type& operator [] (u32 index) const {
271
272 return at(index);
273 }
274#pragma endregion
275
279
280#pragma region Methods
281 private:
282 template<typename item_passed_type>
283 inline u32 insert_main_t(item_passed_type&& item, u32 insertion_index) {
284
285 ++count_;
286
287 if (is_fl_empty() || (item_vector_.size() == insertion_index)) {
288
289 item_vector_.resize(item_vector_.size() + 1);
290 is_fragmented_ = 0;
291
292 }
293 else {
294
295 if(insertion_index == insertable_index())
296 fl_pop();
297
298 }
299
300 item_vector_[insertion_index] = std::forward<item_passed_type>(item);
301 item_vector_[insertion_index].is_free = 0;
302
303 return insertion_index;
304 }
305
306
307
308 public:
309 inline u32 insert(const item_type& item) {
310
311 return insert_main_t(std::forward<const item_type&>(item), insertable_index());
312 }
313 inline u32 insert(item_type&& item) {
314
315 return insert_main_t(std::forward<item_type>(item), insertable_index());
316 }
317 inline u32 insert(const item_type& item, u32 insertion_index) {
318
319 return insert_main_t(std::forward<const item_type&>(item), insertion_index);
320 }
321 inline u32 insert(item_type&& item, u32 insertion_index) {
322
323 return insert_main_t(std::forward<item_type>(item), insertion_index);
324 }
325
326 inline void erase(u32 index) {
327
328 fl_push(index);
329
330 }
331
332 inline void fl_push(u32 index) {
333
334 --count_;
335
336 item_type& tail_item = item_vector_[index];
337 tail_item.fl_next_index = fl_tail_;
338 tail_item.is_free = 1;
339
340 fl_tail_ = index;
341 if (fl_head_ == NCPP_U32_MAX)
342 fl_head_ = fl_tail_;
343
344 is_fragmented_ = 1;
345
346 }
347
348 inline void fl_pop() {
349
350 item_type& tail_item = item_vector_[fl_tail_];
351 fl_tail_ = tail_item.fl_next_index;
352 if (fl_tail_ == NCPP_U32_MAX) {
353
354 fl_head_ = NCPP_U32_MAX;
355 is_fragmented_ = 0;
356
357 }
358
359 }
360
361 inline u32 back_index() const {
362
363 i64 i = size() - 1;
364 for (; i >= 0; --i) {
365
366 if (item_vector_[i].is_free == 0) {
367
368 return i;
369
370 }
371
372 }
373
374 }
375
376 inline void swap_items(u32 index1, u32 index2) {
377
378 std::swap(item_vector_[index1], item_vector_[index2]);
379
380 }
381
382 inline item_type& at(u32 index) {
383
384 assert(index < item_vector_.size() && "index out of range");
385
386 return item_vector_[index];
387 }
388 inline const item_type& at(u32 index) const {
389
390 assert(index < item_vector_.size() && "index out of range");
391
392 return item_vector_[index];
393 }
394
395 inline void clear() {
396
397 fl_head_ = NCPP_U32_MAX;
398 fl_tail_ = NCPP_U32_MAX;
399 is_fragmented_ = 0;
400 item_vector_.clear();
401
402 }
403
404 inline u32 insertable_index() const {
405
406 return (
407 fl_tail_ * (fl_tail_ != NCPP_U32_MAX)
408 + (fl_tail_ == NCPP_U32_MAX) * item_vector_.size()
409 );
410 }
411
412 inline void __unsafe__clear_fl() {
413
414 fl_head_ = NCPP_U32_MAX;
415 fl_tail_ = NCPP_U32_MAX;
416
417 }
418 inline void __unsafe__resize(u32 new_size) {
419
420 item_vector_.resize(new_size);
421
422 }
423 inline void __unsafe__set_count(u32 new_count) {
424
425 count_ = new_count;
426
427 }
428#pragma endregion
429
430 };
431
432 }
